DISQUALIFY.SENIORITY: Candidate has not enough or too much experience
DISQUALIFY.INCOMPLETE_CV: Candidate CV is too old or incomplete
DISQUALIFY.WRONG_LANGUAGE_CV: Candidate CV is not in english
DISQUALIFY.CONFLICT: Candidate is already working or has previously worked with the client
DISQUALIFY.DUPLICATE: Candidate has already been submitted for this job
